title: The Man Who Doesn't Take Off His Clothes 1
description: Anna Kaitani led an unremarkable life in every sense —cursed with a girl’s name and a total disinterest in the stressful world of work projects and corporate greed, he only accepts a position at a prestigious cosmetics company to appease a well-connected uncle.  However, a chance meeting with an old high school pal proves to be the motivating spark that Kaitani craves.  Suddenly, spearheading the risky design plans for a brand-new men’s line becomes Kaitani’s passion...and his boss, the snobbish and demanding Section Chief Fujiwara, seems hell-bent on killing his dream!  Why are these two merciless men torturing one another?  And what will finally happen when their rivalry violently binds them together?
author: Narise Konohara
